A[32] B[32] ALUControl[2] Result[32] ALUFlags[4] #NZCV
0x00000000 0x00000000 00 0x00000000 0100 #ADD 0+0
0x00000000 0xFFFFFFFF 00 0xFFFFFFFF 1000 #ADD 0+(-1)
0x00000001 0xFFFFFFFF 00 0x00000000 0110 #ADD 1+(-1), the carry out is high as the ADDer has no concept of two's complement
0x000000FF 0x00000001 00 0x00000100 0000 #ADD 0xFF+0x01

0x00000000 0x00000000 01 0x00000000 0110 #SUB 0-0
0x00000000 0xFFFFFFFF 01 0x00000001 0000 #SUB 0-(-1)
0x00000001 0x00000001 01 0x00000000 0110 #SUB 1-1
0x00000001 0xFFFFFFFF 01 0x00000002 0000 #SUB 1-(-1)
0x00000100 0x00000001 01 0x000000FF 0010 #SUB 0x100-0x001

0xFFFFFFFF 0xFFFFFFFF 10 0xFFFFFFFF 1000 #AND FFFFFFFF, FFFFFFFF
0xFFFFFFFF 0x12345678 10 0x12345678 0000 #AND FFFFFFFF, 12345678
0x12345678 0x87654321 10 0x02244220 0000 #AND 12345678, 87654321
0x00000000 0xFFFFFFFF 10 0x00000000 0100 #AND 00000000, FFFFFFFF

0xFFFFFFFF 0xFFFFFFFF 11 0xFFFFFFFF 1000 #OR FFFFFFFF, FFFFFFFF
0xFFFFFFFF 0x12345678 11 0xFFFFFFFF 1000 #OR FFFFFFFF, 12345678
0x12345678 0x87654321 11 0x97755779 1000 #OR 12345678, 87654321
0x00000000 0xFFFFFFFF 11 0xFFFFFFFF 1000 #OR 00000000, FFFFFFFF
